column3: Latest; Phnom Penh: Two men were sat openly having a yuletide toot
column4: seemingly not caring a figgy pudding about cops along National Road 5 at a point near the Caltex petrol station in Sangkat Toul Sangk 1
column5: Khan Russei Keo.------The men happily smiled for cameras on the afternoon as they partook in smoking methamphetamine of December 24
column7: while passers by looked on. ------KBN------UPDATE:  Seng Nguonda
column9: a homeless man sleeping on the streets around Russey Keo was later brought in for questioning. He was later sent to the Ministry of Social Affairs.
